enchantment.toads-toolbox.moltenwalker.d: Allows you to walk on lava and hides fire overlay while worn. Does not make you immune to fire.
enchantment.toads-toolbox.leaping.desc: Gives you the Jump Boost effect while worn, causing you to jump higher.
enchantment.toads-toolbox.jetstream.desc: Allows you to dash underwater. This dash is much stronger, and does not use up charge.
enchantment.toads-toolbox.gust.desc: Causes the dash to be much more powerful. Replaces the charge with a long cooldown, allowing you to dash while midair without having to touch the ground.
